alert.note: Alert for Escambia Coastal; Escambia Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 12:39AM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Baldwin, Santa Rosa and Escambia Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1139 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Perdido Beach, or 7 miles east of Orange Beach, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pensacola, Ferry Pass, Brent, West Pensacola, Ensley, Gonzalez, Foley, Pace, Milton, Orange Beach, Goulding, Bagdad, Lillian, Myrtle Grove, Oriole Beach, Bon Secour, Navarre, Molino, Perdido Beach and Jay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Escambia Coastal; Escambia Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland
